Satoshi to Bitcoin: A Bitcoin Calculator

21’s new payment channels will use satoshis as a system resource.

There are already about 2,000 Google searches per month for a satoshi to bitcoin converter. After a few searches I realized there isn’t a simple converter out there, so I created Satoshi to Bitcoin.

It’s a simple calculator that does satoshi to BTC and BTC to satoshi, with more to come!

Visit satoshitobitcoin.co to try it out.

Written on February 14, 2016
